data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Peña Cantero, Álvaro L., Horton, Tammy (2017): Benthic hydroids (Cnidaria, Hydrozoa) from bathyal and abyssal depths of the Northeast Atlantic held in the modern Discovery Collections. Zootaxa 4347 (1): 1-30, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4347.1.1|1 occurrence
